title: Assessing forest fragmentation due to land use changes from 1992 to 2023: A spatio-temporal analysis using remote sensing data
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Khadim Hussain, Kaleem Mehmood, Shoaib Ahmad Anees, Zhidan Ding, Sultan Muhammad, Tariq Badshah, Fahad Shahzad, Ijlal Haidar, Abdul Wahab, Jamshid Ali, Mohammad Javed Ansari, Saleh H. Salmen, Sun Yujun, Waseem Razzaq Khan
